title: Fps Issues Late Game
body: I have 180 fps when the game starts and by late game I have like 40, it could be my computer overheating, but I've checked the temps and its the same when i'm not playing the game. (I have a desktop not a laptop)

replies.body:
Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg
Ive already done most of the stuff on that list and I still have the issue.

I was thinking there may be a heating issue too if your fps was gradually degrading, but there may be other reasons.  Since the FPS Issues guide didn't resolve this, hit up our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Gather the following set of logs to help with this and attach it to your ticket:

[DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
[Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
Perform all of the steps in the article and let us know if it your issue persists.
This happened to me yesterday, I couldn't even play the game, I restarted my computer while in game, then when I joined back it was better.
